long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This add-on aims to simplify agile workflow for developers. It links harvest time entries to pivotal stories, it copies to the clipboard ready for acceptance titles and messages from any pivotal story and it autofills new messages on Basecamp.
